descriptionHtml:
Also yes, at first i did to make the sword in gold BUT there are some issues u should know...

the normal Imperial Sword have also Gold Shapes also tmy Custom ones, reason ehm ja XD i tried to make the custom gold not the normal but i guess i make this someday fixing until i can begin the full package 


location of sword in in Dragonreach on the foodtables

for own creation sword (new model) i still need more practis lol XD


this sword just contains double status on regular also 22dmg etc (no enchantment)

where to place:

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

make sure esp. is on by launcher to work.



hint: am currently an EXTREM newbie about moding... like everyone was XD everyone begins so XD
author: bardockssj
